testcase.name: wallpaper section actions
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the Asian Paints website......................................passed When I navigate to the Paints & Colours section and navigate to wallpapers..passed And I click on good earth wallpapers........................................passed And I select abstract and botanical and botanicalandfloral filters..........passed Then the selected wallpaper are filtered....................................passed

testcase.system-out: Given I am on the Asian Paints website......................................passed When I navigate to wallpapers and add filters..............................passed And I click on clear all....................................................passed Then the selected filteres are cleared.....................................passed

testcase.system-out: Given I am on the Asian Paints website......................................passed When I navigate to exterior textures.......................................passed And I click on filters.....................................................passed And I click on Apex Createx Dholpur and Economy.............................passed Then I can see the filtered results after clicking submit...................passed
